metadata.title: CVE-2023-40458 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: Loop with Unreachable Exit Condition ('Infinite Loop') vulnerability inSierra Wireless, Inc ALEOS could potentially allow a remote attacker totrigger a Denial of Service (DoS) condition for ACEManager withoutimpairing other router functions. This condition is cleared by restartingthe device.

criterions.comment: tinyxml package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
